name: Brittas
info: This week's race takes place on the Brittas Circuit. Sign on at the Blue Gardenia in Brittas from 6:30pm with the first race off at 7pm. We'll run four separate races, numbers permitting
• Scratch and Semi Scratch - 4 times over the bridge for a race distance of around 46km
• Limit and Semi Limit - 3 times over the bridge for a race distance of around 35km
The finish line will be a few hundred metres before the top of the drag at Oldcourt
Marshals, please arrive by 6:30pm short. If you can drive lead car, let us know in advance
